title: Rice Shoulder
description: Okome Akino is an 18-year-old heavyweight from rural Iwate Prefecture, standing 193cm tall and weighing 92kg. She entered her villageâ€™s sumo tournament and defeated one man after another, ultimately claiming the title of champion. Witnessing her impressive display by chance was Akane, a trainer at a Tokyo boxing gym, who was traveling across the country in search of promising female boxers. And so, fate begins to lead Okome into the world of boxing!
author: Tsuyoshi Nakaima
